channel.title: backpack on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in backpack on Barefoot Rob

item.title: new hybrid rolling backpack
item.description: Sunday 5 August 2018 JST (written 13:06 Wednesday 08 August 2018 JST) I got a new backpack a couple of days ago. Actually it is a hybrid rolling backpack. It was less than 1⁄2 price because of the color, approximately あかむらさき “red purple” according to one of my magic markers. I would call it magenta. Lin does not like the color. I figure no one will steal it, plus it is easy to identify in a lineup.
